See in real-time where all the buses are.  Choose your TVS mode:  TVS |   Mobile Access |  Text Version |   Announcements             Reading a Timetable   Timetables show when a bus will arrive at each stop along the route.     Find the heading for your departure point (make sure you have the correct timetable, direction and time of travel).   Look down the column under your departure heading to find the time you will need to be at the bus stop.   Locate the heading for your destination.   Read across from your departure time to determine your arrival time.   If you need to transfer, follow the same steps for the second route. (Your destination point on the first route will be your departure point on the second route).   If you want to reach a destination by a specific time, it may be easier to work backwards. In other words, find the arrival time you want for your destination first; then reverse the process to find the time you should be at the first stop to begin your trip.           Route A            Route B            Route C            Route E            Route F            Route G            Route W            Feedback Form                             Service Announcements                                      Note: Scheduled times as listed within Campus Transportation Services timetables are approximate, and due to New York City traffic congestion, your trip may be delayed. Please plan your trip accordingly and allow for sufficient time when riding Campus Transportation Services vehicles. Your patience is appreciated when delays occur, and Campus Transportation Services apologizes for any such delays that you may encounter. Calendars & Schedules                       NYU myTime                       Accessing & Managing Payroll Information                       Wage Witholding Information & Resources                       Form W-2                                                                   Form W-2       2014 Electronic Form W-2's are Now Available        Accessing Your 2014 Electronic Form W-2     To access your 2014 Form W-2 online:     Log in to NYU Home   Access PeopleSync via the Work Tab   Select the "Pay" icon   Select “My Tax Documents”     Select the “View/Print” button under Employee Copy in the Tax Form section     Accessing Electronic Form W-2 Quick Step Guide          Consent for an Electronic Only Form W-2    To receive an electronic W-2 ONLY, please complete the following steps.   Please note: If you provided consent in a prior year, it will still apply and you do not need to consent again.     Log in to NYU Home   Access PeopleSync via the Work Tab   Select the "Pay" icon   Select “My Tax Documents”   Edit your selection to “Receive electronic copy of my Year End Tax Documents”     Electronic Form W-2 Consent Quick Step Guide           Accessing Historical Form W-2's (2008 - 2013)   To access your Form W-2 from 2008 through 2013:     Login to the Work tab on NYUHome   Click the Historical W-2 button   Click on the W-2 Reissue link   Select the year from the drop down box   Select a reason under the Reason For Reissue   Click Continue to Print   Click on W2 Form link     Polytechnic School of Engineering (SOE) employees can access their historical W-2s (prior to 2014) in iPay .   If you have questions, please contact PeopleLink at AskPeopleLink@nyu.edu or 212-992-LINK (5465).
